feedback:
Good application of DRIVER framework (demonstrated 4 stages). Consider strengthening the stages you didn't explicitly show.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The transcript shows a working tool that accepts stock tickers, returns real-time prices, risk assessments, probability of profit, and buy/hold recommendations with supporting sources (Discover and Implement stages). Those concrete outputs and examples (Apple, Nvidia) demonstrate the app functions as a financial application, meeting PASS criteria.
- Integrate AI: The submission shows substantive AI integration with multiple concrete outputs (AI-generated summaries, risk assessments, probabilistic profit estimates) and cited sources across examples (Apple and Nvidia). These indicate the AI adds analytic value beyond superficial use, meeting the PASS standard.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "This app provides investment analysis beyond numbers."
"these are all of the sources that my app used to figure out all this stuff."
"you're also getting a lot of profit, 80% of estimated profit, which is very, very good for a stock."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover — student describes the app's financial purpose (investment analysis, risk assessment, buy/hold advice).  
Implement — student notes the app they built and lists the data sources used to produce analyses and recommendations.
criteria.reasoning: The transcript shows a working tool that accepts stock tickers, returns real-time prices, risk assessments, probability of profit, and buy/hold recommendations with supporting sources (Discover and Implement stages). Those concrete outputs and examples (Apple, Nvidia) demonstrate the app functions as a financial application, meeting PASS criteria.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "it has an AI summary. Apple demonstrates strong financial performance in an ambitious 2026 product pipeline. But current valuation concerns and ongoing regulatory geopolitical risk warrant a cautious hold position..."
"This is my app that I've created."
"Then the recommendation um is to hold if you have it. Um if you were to buy there's a 65% chance that you're going to uh actually make money within a 6 to 12 month month range."
criteria.driver_alignment:
- Discover: student describes app capabilities (investment analysis beyond numbers; buy/sell advice; profit likelihood), showing concept and intended AI use.
- Implement: student states "This is my app that I've created" and shows outputs (AI summaries, risk levels, probability estimates, and cited sources), demonstrating concrete AI integration.
criteria.reasoning: The submission shows substantive AI integration with multiple concrete outputs (AI-generated summaries, risk assessments, probabilistic profit estimates) and cited sources across examples (Apple and Nvidia). These indicate the AI adds analytic value beyond superficial use, meeting the PASS standard.
